section.title: I18n View Helpers
section.para: In your view scripts, often it is necessary to perform certain complex functions over and over: e.g., formatting a date, formatting currency, or displaying translated content. You can use helper, or plugin, classes to perform these behaviors for you.
See the section on view helpers for more information.
